description: How participant identifier should be extracted: idloc=2 looks at the filename and extracts the character string preceding the first occurance of a '_', idloc = 6  '.' (dot)
Timezone in which experiments took place according to the timezone database (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zone.tab). If empty, then local timezone where the app is run will be used.
Timestamp format in R code, e.g.  %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S, see also https://www.stat.berkeley.edu/~s133/dates.html
Control the output modality of hbGPS
Acceleration thresholds corresponding to the intensity levels
